questionTitle: Which of the following is owned by an organization selling cloud services?
questionExplanation: The public cloud infrastructure is available for public use alternatively for a large industry group.

questionOption1: Everything from the application down to the infrastructure is the vendor’s responsibility
questionOption2: In the deployment model, different cloud types are an expression of the manner in which infrastructure is deployed
questionOption3: AaaS provides virtual machines, operating systems, applications, services, development frameworks, transactions, and control structures
questionExplanation: PaaS provides virtual machines, operating systems, applications, services, development frameworks, transactions, and control structures.

questionTitle: _______ provides virtual machines, virtual storage, virtual infrastructure, and other hardware assets.
questionExplanation: The IaaS service provider manages all the infrastructure, while the client is responsible for all other aspects of the deployment.

questionTitle: Which of the following provides development frameworks and control structures?
questionExplanation: Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) is a form of cloud computing that provides virtualized computing resources over the Internet.

questionOption1: A PaaS service adds integration features, middleware, and other orchestration and choreography services to the IaaS model
questionOption2: XaaS or ‘anything as a service’ is the delivery of IT as a Service through hybrid Cloud computing
questionOption3: Monitoring as a Service (MaaS) is at present still an emerging piece of the Cloud jigsaw
questionExplanation: Monitoring as a Service provides the option to offload a large majority of those costs by having it run as a service as opposed to a fully invested in house tool.

questionTitle: _______ is a complete operating environment with applications, management, and user interface.
questionExplanation: In the SaaS model, the application is provided to the client through a thin client interface.

questionTitle: How many types of service model are mainly present in Cloud?
questionExplanation: Three types of Service model exist.

questionTitle: The three different service models are together known as the _____ model of cloud computing.
questionExplanation: Many other service models are also present.

Communication as a Service (CaaS), enables the consumer to utilize Enterprise level VoIP, VPNs, PBX and Unified Communications without the costly investment of purchasing, hosting and managing the infrastructure.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the IaaS service provider?
questionExplanation: On Amazon EC2, a client would provision a computer in the form of a virtual machine image.
